channel.title: Proxies on WIMART Thomas
channel.description: Recent content in Proxies on WIMART Thomas

item.title: Create a proxy server with Pfsense and Squid(Part 2)
item.description: The different parts of this tutorial: Part-1 Part-2 Part-3 Part-4 Part-5 Pfsense installation Click on “Accept”. Select “Install”, then “OK” The wizard will then ask you to select the layout of your keyboard (I have a French keyboard). Select the layout that suits you, then press “Select”. Confirm your choice. We are then asked how to partition our disk. Choose “Auto (UFS) BIOS”, then “OK”. Pfsense will then start its installation:
